user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, durable, and well-fitting underwear that I could wear daily without any discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would fit well and feel soft against my skin. The emphasis on durability and the promise of retaining color and softness over time were significant factors in my decision. I appreciated the tag-free design, which added to the comfort aspect, and the overall positive reviews about the fit and feel influenced my choice.

I wanted a comfortable and soft pair of boyshorts that I could wear throughout the day without discomfort. The description highlighted the softness and durability of the fabric, which appealed to me. The positive feedback regarding the value for the price also played a role in my decision-making process.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort and support, especially in clothing and footwear. I value items that are made from soft, high-quality materials that provide a good fit and can be worn for extended periods without discomfort. Features like adjustable straps, seamless designs, and breathable fabrics are particularly appealing to me. I also appreciate products that are versatile and can be used in various settings, whether casual or more formal. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that lack proper support, have awkward shapes, or do not fit true to size. Poor quality and discomfort are significant turn-offs for me, as I seek value for my money and a pleasant wearing experience.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable, durable, and well-fitting underwear for daily wear. within my expected price range: [15.97, 29.48]
What specific material do you prefer for your underwear, such as cotton, modal, or synthetic fabrics?
I prefer underwear made from soft, high-quality materials like cotton or modal. Comfort and durability are essential to me.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear> / Item ID: B08YFLPPDM / Price: $14.18 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features the ultra soft waistband that won't pinch or bind. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Made from ultra soft, breathable ring-spun cotton these panties will keep you feeling fresh all day with Cool Comfort wicking technology. These panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Hipster Underwear."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Hi Panties Pack, Moisture-Wicking High-Cut Brief Underwear (Colors May Vary)> / Item ID: B0BRT5PMTX / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["For the leaner, longer, sexier look you want, try Hanes® high-cut cotton briefs. You'll love the silhouette, styled with hi-cut legs and full-coverage front and back, plus the comfort of no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. These quality essential panties are made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. This Hanes®-best underwear has a narrow no-pinch logo waistband that's ultra soft for comfort where you need it most. Plus the cotton is preshrunk so the size you buy is the size they stay. These high-cut cotton briefs from Hanes® are available in convenient stock-up 6-packs in assorted colors."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Soffe Men's Authentic Ranger Panty> / Item ID: B08F8KW9V9 / Price: $21.82 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Briefs'] / Description: ["The Ranger Panty is a favorite of military personal. It is made of loose fitting soft tricot and it won't snag or run. The Ranger Panty features an internal liner, improved pocket for keys or ID, and will be the only thing you'll want to wear. The Ranger Panty is often referred to as silkies, silky smooth, we just call it the best selling Soffe men's short."]
